title: endigAdiru
sahitya:
endigAdiru ninna pAdAravindavE gatiyendu nambidanO


anupallavi

  bandhu baLagava biTTu bande ninna mana cintu 
mandaradhara gOvindA purandara viTTalane nI bandu


caraNam 1    anyaroppara kANe mannisuvaranna Apanna rakSanE 
paripAlisu innu pannaga shayana shrI purandara viTTalane bandu
    caraNam 2    bAribArigeE ninna caraNakkeE sharaNambE bhArati ramaNane bArO 
managintu kande shrI purandara viTTalana rAyana ettittikO nInE jagakE bandu
